attributes.action: I would like all candidates for Priminister tested for illegal drug use.
attributes.additional_details: I feel after multiple admissions of drug use by candidates and MPs in office mandatory drug testing should be the norm.
attributes.background: I have lost confidence in the candidates for Priminister and in actual fact in MPs all together. I propose that all candidates to replace May and all MPs are tested before and regularly whilst in office.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for party leadership elections.

You might want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264011
